skills.name: Laser
skills.description: Rapid-fire weapon that deals continuous DMG to targets along a straight line of fire. Continuous firing will overheat the weapon. Closer enemies will take more DMG, with DMG maximized at a range within 3 meters.

skills.name: Devouring Impact
skills.description: [SP: 25][CD: 20s] Slams the ground with robot arms to unleash a psychic impact wave that generates multiple explosions. Each explosion deals 214 Fire DMG and ignites enemies, dealing 134 Fire DMG every 0.5s for 4s. Provides a temporary Move Speed boost after using the skill.
